documents.document: Just got a copy of your book @molly_knight - can't wait to read - Can you write one on the Worst Team Money Can't Buy (Seattle Mariners)
EGAD - 26 people leaving Sun and Province today - I only had the names of 10 - not even half!!
When Charles Barkley and Lebron James go to war, my money is on Lebron, unless there's eating or a golf club involved
@josephmerto already given away
And no @littleJRmaza - I have not learned any Kendrick Lamar or Eminem lyrics since I got to @wmphoenixopen
Second time in 3 days for a @littleJRmaza press conference - hard to believe his English was so bad 4 years ago. Very good now
There were just under 12,000 people @wmphoenixopen on Monday - seemed like a lot more here on Tuesday
Am I really a winner? Just won a pair of tix to see Coyotes - Ducks on Feb. 20 - Second prize was 4 tickets!!
Here's the difference 1 Stanley Cup makes: LA at Coyotes tonight $10 get-in for 2-time champ. Chi at AZ Thurs $80 get in for 3-time champ
And let's not forget the CTV/Bell Media cuts of Coleen Christie, Kent Molgat, Scott Rintoul and Peter Schaad. All professionals. 5
And bear in mind, there are apparently 20-plus so this is just a list of half the people who have left today at the Sun and Province 4.
I didn't know all of them, but the ones I did know were all very good, hard-working journalists. Their loss hurts the entire business 3.
This might be the worst day in history of British Columbia/Lower Mainland journalism. Here's a Twitter-confirmed list of Sun/Prov buyouts 1.
4 other Canadians in field @wmphoenixopen - DeLaet 12:52/8:42, @machughesgolf 8:24/12:34, D Hearn 7:48/11:58, @ntaylorgolf59 8:15/12:25
BREAKING: @wmphoenixopen has a 59-60 group featuring @ahadwingolf Justin Thomas & Phil Mickelson Off 1 at 12:07 Thursday, 7:57 am off 10 Fri
@erikrolfsen enjoying the sun in Phoenix. Enjoy the buyout money and relax before the next big move!
4. Also missing out are current NCAA champ Aaron Wise, another acclaimed youngster Beau Hossler, along with Cdns David Rose, Kevin Stinson
3. But take a look at who also missed out - 2 time US Open winner Lee Janzen, Masters champ Mike Weir, British Open champ Ben Curtis
2. Great 66 by Seann Harlingten, but not quite like Michael Schoolcraft's 62, Alex Kim's 63 or Jim Knous at 65
1. This is how tough it is to Monday qualify at @wmphoenixopen - only 3 spots, -6 66 not good enough to get in, not even a playoff
@erikrolfsen good luck and beat of wishes from an old classmate
@GraemeMcRanor yup. All the names I put out are already out there
@graememcranor Here's the ones we know: Howie, Weber, Johnny Mac, Jeff Lee, Erin Ellis . . . you got any more?
But I've read most of them anyway already. Great work Howie, Jeff Lee, Marc Weber, Jonathan MacDonald - all good and classy goodbyes
I'll be very interested to see if there's any room in the Vancouver Sun and Province for actual stories between all the farewell columns
@RDUBGOLF @RavenPHX you gonna try and Monday tomorrow?
One other takeaway from quick chat with Tim Mickelson - he's a little envious of ASU being in Hawaii right now. Just a little
I may be in the States but thank God I'm not flying anywhere. Airports here look interesting - and not in a good way
Who else do I miss? David Baines, David Hogben, Katherine Monk, James Kwantes, Gord Hamilton, Les Bazso. Probably forgetting some
A lot of the people I read and respect now gone from Sun/Province - Cam Cole, Brad Ziemer, Elliott Pap, Howie, Janet Steffenhagen, Jeff Lee
I am so sad for what's happening to the newspaper industry, especially in my hometown of Vancouver. Happy trails Howie Tsumura and Jeff Lee
Champ is in the house https://t.co/3MhmOhrtlm
I'm sure I couldn't have been the only one who had no idea which rap songs @littleJRMaza referenced - I barely know Eminem/Kendrick Lamar
One more night in San Diego before I head east - going to visit the Turner family in Mesa, AZ
I'm pretty close to the US-Mexico border. I will not be going to San Ysidro or Tijuana tonight - or ever, for that matter
Watching the sun set on my right at Torrey Pines does not suck
Here is @FarmersInsOpen champ @littleJRmaza https://t.co/4s5YzcsUrj
Prior to that, biggest class in Spain was 30 students - first term at ASU was a huge struggle with English, said on scale of 1/10, was a 1
More @littleJRMaza trivia: remembers first college class, Econ 212 at ASU, entered class of 375, thought he was in a movie theatre 1/2
Another interesting @littleJRMaza tidbit - does all his yardages in metres - didn't change during 4 years in college, so not changing now
Apparently @littleJRmaza learned English by memorizing lyrics to Kendrick Lamar's Poetic Justice and Money Trees - I'm oblivious to both!
A most interesting presser with @littleJRMaza - still don't know what a burpie is, nor the Kendrick Lamar and Eminem rap songs he referenced
Just had a nice conversation with Tim Mickelson about @jareddutoit - sees a bright future for the young Canadian he recruited to ASU
Been about 90 minutes since @littleJRmaza finished at @farmersinsopen - He still has obligations before coming to see the media
@tonyjdear Same players/caddies added they knew there was no way Clarke could pick him, but it would have been bold
All these millionaires splitting a million for an All-Star game win . . . . .that's huge, isn't it?
Skydiver coming in with trophy for Jon Rahm @littleJRMaza - means it will be a while before he comes in to do post @farmersinsopen
Now that's a positive for @machughesgolf - he's still ahead of @littleJRMaza in the FedEx Cup after @farmersinsopen
@camtucker_sport First is too rich, couple of sixths, rights to Chris Levesque and Matt Hewitt, along with old-timers rights to Dana Murzyn
@tonyjdear Scuttlebutt here in San Diego is European players/caddies thought Rahm would have been an awesome wildcard pick last year
No playoff in San Diego. Normal finishing time. All is good, unlike in 2008 (US Open), 2013 and 2016 #mondayfinishessuck
Amazing how everybody started looking at the cahillkelley Twitter account
USA-Serbia goalless in San Diego. Setting soccer back into the Dark Ages
JJ Spaun double at 18 cost him a bit of change - could have been solo or T2, now T8 @farmersinsopen
Amazing how quick things changed @farmersinsopen - At one point, 10-person tie for lead but now Rahm has all but won with 3 groups left
So @littleJRMaza now a PGA Tour winner @farmersinsopen - headed "home" to play Waste Management Open - could be quite the zoo
New Indy Colts GM - Chris Ballard just announced by the team
How the cookie crumbles - Jon Rahm under the radar, now likely winner @farmersinsopen
Looks like the only guy who can catch @littleJRmaza now is Taiwan/UW's CT Pan. Will have to do something magical @farmersinsopen
@jareddutoit @littlejrmaza You would have holed the 2nd right, Jared? Great playing by your former teammate. Great finish @farmersinsopen
@mattthurmond @asumensgolf @littlejrmaza Now let's see if CT Pan can match him
Canadian connection to Jon Rahm - teammate of @jareddutoit at ASU last year - now looks like a PGA Tour winner @farmersinsopen
60 foot eagle for Jon Rahm, that may seal the deal here in San Diego @farmersinsopen
Big cheer everywhere with Jon Rahm making eagle at 18 - now 3 clear at -13 @farmersinsopen
JJ Spaun just spent a lot of money by rinsing his third at 18 @farmersinsopen
Final numbers in for 5 Cdns @farmersinsopen - @ahadwingolf -1; @machughesgolf @ntaylorgolf59 @grahamdelaet ; Even @bradfritsch +3
If Jon Rahm wins today, big assist to his manager Tim Mickelson, who knows a thing or two about Torrey Pines
Charles Howell first to get into the house at -10 @farmersinsopen - may not be enough with Rahm at -11 and in A-position on 18
CT Pan with must-make par putt - still 2 behind Jon Rahm, but birdie holes left to play @farmersinsopen
It only took 9 days for the first flare-up in the Trump presidency. Honestly, if I weren't already in America, probably wouldn't have come
Some guys starting to fall back @farmerinsopen - Might be the Spaun-Rahm show - coming from 5 groups behind
We're happy to see somebody go to -11- Jon Rahm with a birdie hole left to play. If he gets in at -12, will be tough to beat @farmersinsopen
It's calling spending a lot of money on the weekend - Adam Hadwin's 74-76 and finish at -1 tough to watch, but he will rebound
Now it's a 4 way tie at the top @farmersinsopen - Rahm, Pan, Rodgers and Finau - somebody has to win today, right?
Phil finishes at -7 @farmersinsopen - Decent, but a couple of back-9 bogeys slowed the momentum
It is awesome out at Torrey Pines today for @farmersinsopen - WEather great, bunched leader board - somebody gonna win this
Sign of the times: No copies of San Diego Union Tribune in media centre - and nobody seems to be missing it #sad #theendisnigh
That's some epic bad scheduling. US Men's National Soccer team playing Serbia at Qualcomm, about 30 minutes away. I'm at @farmersinsopen
Like the good ol' days of UW Huskies vs. ASU Sun Devils, it's Pan v. Rahm but it's now for the @farmersinsopen in San Diego. Tied for lead
Cheng Tsung Pan, pride of Taiwan and the University of Washington - tied for the lead at -9 @farmersinsopen
This is how fast things change @farmersinsopen - Just say Keegan and Sneds make bogey to fall to -8. Then Pan, Rodgers, Finau all go to -9
Let's get it right this time - Sushi on a Roll in San Diego serving us To Die For lunch @farmersinsopen - Go and support this local treasure
Amazing weather here in San Diego - It wasn't quite as nice early in the week, but I wasn't here then @farmersinsopen
It is a Chamber of Commerce Day here in San Diego. Awesome 79 degrees, sung and warm at Torrey Pines @farmersinsopen #justlikehome
We used to rave when Fleming's Steakhouse offered filet mignon on Sunday in San Diego. Now its Sushi Roll with awesomeness
Keegan Bradley jars one on 14 - now -5 for the day and tied for the lead at -9 with Brandt Snedeker @farmersinsopen
Why doesn't CBS just start their college coverage a half our earlier - that's 20 minutes of @farmersinsopen coverage we're not getting
We don't want to mention the P word here but with 3 co-leaders and 11 within a stroke of the lead, we might be here a while @farmersinsopen
Birdies at 6 and 9, the par-5s at Torrey Pines South @farmersinsopen - has @ahadwingolf back to -3, 6 back of leaders
Nice of Golf Channel to show us some tape-delayed women's golf
@shanelpratap At least it was a nice bogey on 1. Fluffed chip on 1, airmailed chip on 2, missed 3 footer for double #justlikeus
@shanelpratap It was just a bogey on the first - made a great 20 footer for that bogey. 2nd was hack and slash and missed 3 footer for 6
Out to catch @ahadwingolf during final round of @farmersinsopen - tough start, as he made bogey at 1, triple at 2. Made pars at 3 and 4
Up deep into the night to watch the GOAT Roger Federer win his 18th Major - Congrats Champ
And so it begins 'Murica. Who's applying for asylum in canada ?
@scotthansongolf it still sucks but good news that all is getting better. Awful winter in Vancouver. Still snow on my lawn. 7 weeks of bad
@scotthansongolf this does not suck https://t.co/8QkD6bQ09R
@scotthansongolf followed another UW alum. Nick Taylor. Not as good a day as Pan
@scotthansongolf sorry to hear about the house. Hope all is well. Drive 25 hours to Torrey and see how you feel. Recuperating at beach now
@scotthansongolf @UW_MGolf @ctpan63 playing well. Saw him for a couple holes today.
